documents.document: @Citation_Cormac @Stevenward_ 16,800. Sometimes when a place is less than 2/3 full, it feels empty. This place felt packed
@Chriskee3 10 to 15 degrees or something, nice enough, but I was barely outside
Good chat was had with @SkyAdamSmith on a big year for @KatieTaylor and @ryanburnett01 https://t.co/SCWqtKF8qC
A goozer at Monday's @IrishSunSport. Fear the headline is wishful thinking but @ClonesCyclone will pull out all sto… https://t.co/seHHusc8xY
@FV360Yo_Mikey think it was Avalos he was at, getting pelters from the crowd, was grinning, telling us he loves it, then doing selfies
@FV360Yo_Mikey He did the same this week, was loving it. But I did see Quigg doing the same - he came over a few times, lapped it up
@Stephena1972 agree to an extent
Probably just a classic case of 'do as your hero does'
Incidentally I often thought the Frampton fans were too harsh on previous rival Scott Quigg, a lesser challenge, but they like Santa Cruz
"We'll get him back,I promise" says Frampton at Nine Fine Irishmen, or Ground Zero this week https://t.co/4kR3wz9SYY
Bye Vegas, and bye to daily electric shocks in the MGM #SurelyImNotAloneOnThis https://t.co/kl72niiUzp
@jeffrothechamp @RealCFrampton @leosantacruz2 both gave the fans what they wanted, always do. Another be interesting
Carl Frampton offered Leo Santa Snooze a bed if he will come to Belfast for rematch https://t.co/VfXt6hUZ8Z
The brawler outboxed the boxer, says @RealCFrampton, after second fight of inevitable trilogy with @leosantacruz2 https://t.co/ZhiTPnHSUk
@Stevenward_ tough to put an accurate number on it, but half the 10000 crowd isn't far off
LSC: If my manager, promoter make a trilogy, let's do it. But there are many options out there too
Santa Cruz: I always said - he has everything. But I had a great game-plan. If I lost to him twice I was going to retire
Frampton says Santa Cruz can come to stay in his house if he'll agree to a trilogy fight in Belfast, then adds they can do it 4, 5 times
Frampton is gutted https://t.co/VeEmogjjBF
Garcia - I felt it was like winning my first title
Garcia - If Lomachenko moves up to 135 and Arum wants to talk to me, I'll definitely take him on
Mikey Garcia - I could be back in another 2-3 months. I'll fight anyone at 135. Love to unify titles. Might have to wait for that though
Frampton was cheered out of the arena
"The brawler was out boxing the boxer." Summed up well by @RealCFrampton, again smarter than most of us who do this for a living!

The trilogy fight will be huge. Santa Cruz learned from the first.
Frampton apologies to the fans
And the new #framptonsantacruz2 https://t.co/BWIqA8et84
Have Santa Cruz by two here, no idea how judges will go. Great fight, one of the best I've been at, two top warriors #framptonsantacruz2
The Nuns of Poor Clare are needed now more than ever
Championship rounds and CF needs both
Ebb and flow in Las Vegas. Level here
Frampton is fighting and frustrating but LSC staying calm 1-1
Frampton has come out as World Fighter of the Year
Key things from Frampton camp. Leo feet slow, power not all that, tactics not as refined. I'm going Frampton PTS, they're going KO
Brilliant entrances, time to go. Draw is 18-1 here in Vegas #framptonsantacruz2
We have a fight https://t.co/VEvwOrGk1h
Millionaires and their whims
Hope Showtime have good mikes https://t.co/HD3NgThEB8
Mayweather going on the box. Hope they ask about his dad v Steve Collins https://t.co/jWYdN7aPvV
@alancaw might be go time soon
Crowd are grimacing at the KO replay, even the Mexicans, given the power Garcia put into those digs. Killer instinct
One of the more brutal stoppages I've seen. Garcia was superb https://t.co/WO1Pgl7lAf
What a KO. Zlaticinin badly hurt and still KO'd. Place goes bonkers for Mikey Garcia, Mexico feeling good #framptonsantacruz2
Garcia has natural authority, assured defence and power in every punch. All going to plan for him #framptonsantacruz2
Lotta love here for Mikey Garcia, Mexicans going nuts for him. Bringing up the atmosphere a couple more notches #framptonsantacruz2
The last Irishman to headline the MGM with one of the select few boxers out there to have beaten Frampton https://t.co/hv7mKJY0bS
Only one Irish boxer has won a world title fight in Las Vegas, Andy Lee. Lennox Lewis 5-0 is best British fighter h… https://t.co/8GWBkCZ5kH
Belfast's finest in the house for #FramptonSantaCruz2 https://t.co/PVo55n3waD
Redkach took a shot to land a shot there on Brock, who needed to be saved when he was #framptonsantacruz2
Shane McGuigan on JoshTaylor win: "I'm happy with his performance. It wasn't his best but he did enough to win." Wants Frampton to convince
@alancaw cheers Al, it's all hard work ;)
@alancaw 4am to be safest
Frampton enters the arena to a loud but mixed reaction - cheers and jeers - same for Santa Cruz. So many Irish camped at the bars
Josh Taylor takes points win over Alfonso Olvera 79-72, 78-73 x 2. Showed familiar flashes of class, Olvera good opponent at this stage
Low blow deduction looked harsh on second inspection. Good clash of styles here
Taylor docked a point for a low blow here in the sixth
Olvera probably only feeling the pain downstairs now too
Olvera badly hurt by a low blow, not sure he'll still fancy this
@spike_osullivan @FloydMayweather @NotoriousMMA @packycollins absolutely, just in spur of the moment I thought Steve v Sr would be a fight
@juniorhalpin @IrishSunOnline @kenegan30 @Willie_Casey boxing people know the craic.
@PaulieDGibson @RealCFrampton so dreamy

Talked to Andy Lee and Steve Collins about why it's being claimed that Frampton isn't a big deal in Rep Ireland

"T-Rex" @RealCFrampton ready to bite down on the gumshield for victory against Leo Santa Cruz, says he's "due" a KO https://t.co/zZnaWdrQkm
@Chris_Meloni I've never asked anyone for a follow, ever, but I'm breaking the habit of a lifetime

Said to Lee Selby the other day, "you're not long for FW, are ya?"
said back "if it was easy to make it I'd be in the wrong division". Shit
Barros didn't meet licencing requirements so won't be fighting Lee Selby. Welshman: "I'm almost in tears." #FramptonSantaCruz2
